availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Louis Bache (Louisville, Kentucky, resident and policeman)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident and policeman. Kentucky native. Son of Louis Bache and Maria Bache. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Policeman in Louisville, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 2, p. 183A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 3, p. 713.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 9, p. 207A.
"Louis Bache Jr. (1841-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial 44836524, accessed November 29, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44836524.
